name: Sengoku
text: On Play: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 2 (Navy) type cards other than [Sengoku] and add them to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: You may trash 1 card from your hand: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 2 (Navy) type cards other than [Sengoku] and add them to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
